title: post api v1 ai generate strategy
description: Test the generation of trading strategy from a natural language prompt including validation of strategy object, explanation, warnings, and suggested improvements in the response.

title: post api v1 backtest run
description: Verify running a backtest on a strategy with specified parameters and validate the returned performance metrics such as net profit, win rate, sharpe ratio, and session status.

title: get api v1 backtest sessions
description: Test listing all backtest sessions ensuring the response includes all sessions with correct metadata.

title: get api v1 backtest sessions session id
description: Validate retrieval of specific backtest session details by session_id and verify the correctness of returned data.

title: ws connector ws
description: Test establishing and maintaining a WebSocket connection for connector apps including authentication with JWT token and connection status tracking.

title: ws connector client
description: Verify WebSocket connection for dashboard clients and ensure real-time updates are pushed correctly.

title: get api v1 ml models
description: Test listing all ML models and verify the response contains correct model configurations.

title: post api v1 ml models
description: Validate creation of ML model configuration with required fields and ensure the model is stored correctly.

title: post api v1 ml models model id train
description: Test initiating training of a specified ML model and verify training status and progress.

title: post api v1 ai chat
description: Test chatting with AI supervisor by sending messages and validate the reply, conversation id, and tokens used in the response.
